title: How Is Biden So Inept? We Are All Ears Like Spock | Daily Best of April 1 | Rick & Bubba
description:
The rubber prosthetic ear tips worn by actor Leonard Nimoy on "Star Trek" have been donated to the Smithsonian, which makes us wonder what we would donate from the Rick & Bubba Show. Bubba shares an AirBnb horror story, then AirBnB hosts call us with tips on how to find legit listings. We are shocked to see Jeopardy contestants don't know who Bo Jackson is. We hear from professional grump, Scott Gurosky. And lastly, Joe Biden manages to fumble his latest speech even though he has a cheat sheet and a teleprompter the size of a big screen TV.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
